summary: A collection of command‑line tools and utilities for training, evaluating, and running inference with grapheme‑to‑phoneme (G2P) models, including specialized handling of heteronym pronunciation, built on NVIDIA NeMo, Hydra configuration, and PyTorch Lightning.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use framework that accelerates development and deployment of accurate pronunciation models for text‑to‑speech systems, helping improve naturalness and correctness of synthesized speech, especially for words with multiple possible pronunciations.
